casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Harold COURTNEY, III 160PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2018 Amanda S. Zimmer, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Courtney, James Harold (III). Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender. Jess D. Mekeel, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 6th of December 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of December 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 28th day of January 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
